findings: ✅ No cloaking patterns detected in server code

recommendations.title: Implement Consistent Routing
recommendations.description: Ensure all routes serve the same content to all users. Remove any bot-specific or search engine-specific routing logic.

recommendations.title: Implement Progressive Enhancement
recommendations.description: Use progressive enhancement techniques to serve basic HTML to all users and enhance with JavaScript for interactive features.
recommendations.impact: Google-compliant way to optimize for search engines

recommendations.title: Regular Compliance Monitoring
recommendations.description: Run this audit regularly to ensure continued compliance with Google's guidelines.
